website_summaries.verdict: An absorbent and fast-drying mat with an attractive design.
pros: Users appreciate the soft feel, stylish look, and ability to be absorbent yet dry quickly
Consumers also like that the colors are true and vibrant
cons: While most feel its drying time was sufficient, a few think it remains damp too long
Others say it traps dust, making it more difficult to clean than some other models

customer_reviews.title: This one is great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: You can’t go wrong with this grippy rug. I ordered two. One for our bathroom and one for my boys bathroom. The mat is soft, soaks up a lot of water, and really stays put. We kept the last one longer than we should have and the edges frayed and it moved around a bunch. This one is great quality for the price. I have washed it a bunch and it comes out like new. I did a lot of research before I purchased and I am happy with this choice.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Rausch

customer_reviews.title: Puppy Approved
customer_reviews.text: I got this rug to go in front of our back door, so when our puppy gets his feet all wet and muddy, he can get them mostly wiped off on his way in the door. it worked well for that purpose, but he likes it more as a bed. looks like i’ll be purchasing another one of these rugs soon so he stops sleeping and playing in front of the door when we have to use it. that being said, it’s a very soft and absorbent rug, and i love how easy it is to wash. don’t really move around, even when our pup is playing on it, so the grip on the bottom works great.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel B.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I loved the rug until after the first wash. The rug backing completely ripped after a cold wash on gentle setting. Then I discover that the 30 day return deadline had passed. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Vittorioso

customer_reviews.title: I purchased two of these and both arrived packaged nicely. The grip on the bottom of the mats ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these and both arrived packaged nicely. The grip on the bottom of the mats keeps them from sliding on the bathroom floor which is extremely nice. The mats themselves are very soft, and so far, I’ve noticed they do a nice job of absorbing water. Would definitely recommend this bath mat. UPDATE: So, I’ve had to wash the mats already thanks to one of our dogs, and I can share that these mats hold up great! I washed on gentle and dried on delicate and both came out looking great and held up perfectly! I was worried that the non slip backing would be an issue, but it wasn’t at all! Super pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa T

customer_reviews.title: Rug Fail
customer_reviews.text: These rugs are on the cheap side. Not very cushiony. Worse, the first time I washed it, the edge began to unravel. I bought a similar but more expensive rug, and it is worth the extra money. I'd avoid this rug.
customer_reviews.author: wine4jac

customer_reviews.title: Definitely NOT non-slip
customer_reviews.text: Who's kidding? These slide around CONSTANTLY. You'd think a name like "Gorilla Grip" would be non-slip right? Re-read the listing carefully. It has "strong backing," but is definitely not going to stay put. You'll have to adjust and re-adjust for the rest of your life. If you're looking for a solution to that issue look elsewhere. Pros: It is definitely plush, true to size and color.
customer_reviews.author: B. Bell

customer_reviews.title: Make very good cat beds and bathroom mats
customer_reviews.text: These gorilla grip bath mats not only work as bathroom mats, but also as cat sleeping beds. They really do grip even slippery surfaces and they are very soft. All of the cat sleeping beds that I have ever purchased move around too much when you put them on top of furniture. You know how cats love to nap on top of your furniture, but my cats were always afraid to use the regular cat beds when I placed them on top of my dressers. But they just love these bathroom mats, and, of course, these bathroom mats wash very well.
customer_reviews.author: Sheperde

customer_reviews.title: Stays put! Roomba can vacuum it!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a bathroom rug that didn’t slip around, was soft, and that my Roomba could vacuum instead of just dragging and pushing it around. And if it kept my husband’s long hair on his side of the bathroom, even better. This is it! Bonus: it’s machine washable! Can’t beat the value for the money. My only tiny gripe is that the rug came with a “part” down the middle from how it was folded and shipped. I can’t quite get it to disappear. It parts a little down the center periodically, but running a foot over it to fluff it up hides it.
customer_reviews.author: S. LeeTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: IF THERE WAS A ZERO (0) STARS, THAT'S WHAT MY RATING WOULD BE
customer_reviews.text: SELLER & CONSUMER - When I received 2 of these Rugs, I was so excited to put them in my bathrooms because I Loved them; Now, I had to come back to change my Review because after a few weeks of use, I washed them according to instructions, took them out of the Washer to dry, and I couldn't believe my eyes - THE ENTIRE NON-SLIP GRIP RUBBER ON THE BACK HAD COME OFF BOTH RUGS. I am not a Happy Camper and of course, I'm not spending the time necessary to send these rugs back, although I should. VERY DISAPPOINTED :-(
customer_reviews.author: 2Puggles

customer_reviews.title: Does not grip as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Does not grip my bathroom floor. I’m scootching it back into place along the floor every day.
customer_reviews.author: isabel

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality & Value
customer_reviews.text: Love the Gorilla non-slip bath mat. It stays in place and absorbs water better than every other mat I have bought. It's soft and looks great. Now I don't have to worry about slipping when I get out of the shower because my bath rug is out of place plus the floor stays dry. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: SJB

customer_reviews.title: Nice rug
customer_reviews.text: I like it! Color is just as described and matches my shower curtain perfectly. It feels very soft under my feet 🤗. I can’t review durability just yet, or how well it does in washing machine but I’ll update my review later.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Ward

customer_reviews.title: Super Upset
customer_reviews.text: These mats got AMAZING reviews and here i am totally pissed. I am guessing i am no different from most people and deep clean my house once a week. I wash these rugs every weekend. Well, the backing has completely come off and nothing smells worse then burning rubber in the dryer. They had to go in the garbage because without the backing they slip all over the floor and the last thing I need is one of my children falling when getting out of the tub. I had bought 4 (two tan and two gray) and it happened with both sets. I should have just stuck with the Walmart brand instead of wasting so much money
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Gorilla grip, my ass..
customer_reviews.text: There is very little grip on this at all. It slips and slides every time I step on it. Last night, I was stepping out of the shower and onto this... And it had somehow gotten water under it. I slipped and fell and nearly wound up in the hospital. No joke.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Not Fluffy At All
customer_reviews.text: I expected these rugs to be a lot more padded and fluffy. I put them down on my tile floor and the rugs were very thin. There was next to no cushion between my feet and the floor. I love the color but they are still a one star for me. Returning ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: flbliss

customer_reviews.title: Luxurious and beneficial
customer_reviews.text: Just what we needed for the master ensuite bathroom and bedside floors. My mother has been slipping and falling on our hard floors and throw mats with no backing. These definitely stay in place and we got them in one day as it was getting critical with her falls and sciatica. They are so nice on the feet giving relief to tired and / or unstable legs.
customer_reviews.author: Gina C.

customer_reviews.title: Very soft - dries quickly - no slipping
customer_reviews.text: This mat is fine. Does the trick - is super soft on your feet when getting out of the shower. Definitely get bang for your buck. It's not plush - it does a good job drying feet and not staying soggy after using. Does not slip all over the floor! I hang the mat on the side of my bathtub when it's not in use - I don't want to get the mat dirty when visitors use the bathroom and set on the mat with their shoes (which would be unavoidable in my small bathroom). Removed one star because it's not
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Very thin and flimsy.  Did not do well in wash
customer_reviews.text: VERY thin. I have towels thicker than this. It may be absorbent, but it is certainly not of any comfort to stand on. I washed on gentle and it did not do well in the wash. VERY disappointed
customer_reviews.author: 99milesaway

customer_reviews.title: Great for our camper!
customer_reviews.text: I initial bought this for our guest bathroom, but it ended up being a bit too small for the space, while at the same time being too bulky for the door, so it would get bunched up. Coincidentally we needed a new bath mat for our camper, and were pleasantly surprised that it fit perfectly! The mat is plush, doesn’t slide, and dries quickly. We will see how it holds up in the washer, but so far we’re pleased we were able to find a use for it.
customer_reviews.author: Chubby Mako

customer_reviews.title: I looked all over and could not find a black bathroom rug like this. Of course Amazon came to the rescue ...
customer_reviews.text: Loving this rug. Redoing the bathroom in black and white. I looked all over and could not find a black bathroom rug like this. Of course Amazon came to the rescue and I found the rug I wanted. Very soft, doesn’t move around. Perfect rug to be by the shower.
customer_reviews.author: CMiles1985

customer_reviews.title: Based on other's reviews I thought this would feel good underneath my feet
customer_reviews.text: Based on other's reviews I thought this would feel good underneath my feet. It is horrible. I should have replaced my memory foam mats with another set of memory foam mats. Also, the color is not as pictured. The gray is more of a blue than what is shown.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy E.

customer_reviews.title: this is a nice rug you won't be sorry
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these! One in the fern colored green, and the other one is in a light blue, I have not washed them, but they are very nice on the feet, and you can ask my cat because she can't seem to get off the fern colored one! She seems to love it! I would purchase these again aesthetically they are very nice as well!
customer_reviews.author: pinkcovered

customer_reviews.title: Best Bath Mat Ever!
customer_reviews.text: So I liked the fact that this was an Amazon recommended item. I was not sure because some reviewers said the mat stays wet for days or longer. Well I can tell you that is not true. I bought this for our two middle school boys and it stays dry almost immediately after they take a shower. We liked the mat so much that we bought one for our bathroom and our in-laws as well. Great product and east to wash as well.
customer_reviews.author: Buddy

customer_reviews.title: This is not a gorilla grip
customer_reviews.text: I am handicapped and had hoped this would be a rug that would diminish likelihood of bathroom slips and falls, but unfortunately, this is the most unsafe throw rug I have ever had. It was totally useless as a safety factor. They need to rename it to "slippery slide"
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Actually the rubber does shred in the dryer
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this bath mat for almost 2 years (purchased in July 2018) and sadly, the rubber backing does shred in the dryer. This past trip through the washer & dryer was its 5th or 6th (yes I’m a little slack on remembering things like that) and the rubber stuff has to be vacuumed out of my dryer now, and it’s in shreds on the mat itself. What I like about it is the color is accurately represented, a nice intense moss green, it’s large, very absorbent, and doesn’t smell or get gross easily. I won’t be able to send it through the dryer again though.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Hyland

customer_reviews.title: Soft, absorbent and quick drying and does NOT slip!
customer_reviews.text: Soft, absorbent and quick drying and does NOT slip. I haven't washed these yet, but if anything changes once I do, I'll update my review.
customer_reviews.author: kbhickman

customer_reviews.title: Not for bathroom
customer_reviews.text: This rug is not good for the bathroom. Any moisture gets under it and you slip and fall! Of corse there is moisture in the bathroom after a shower. I would not recommend this for a bathroom maybe a bedroom or area with hardwood floors. It is soft and nice but very dangerous for a bathroom as intended.
customer_reviews.author: TinaB

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this mat! The color is bright like I hoped for and it is very soft. I have the shiny slippery tile floors in my bathroom and I put one rug in front of the shower and one in front of my counter and I've had no issues with the mat sliding like I read in some of the reviews. I am 100% satisfied so far and will be ordering another set for my 2nd bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Gorilla has a binding issue coming unravelled.
customer_reviews.text: Love the absorbency and selection of colors that Gorilla offers. I have many dozens of Gorilla rugs, yoga mats, etc. I have been unfortunately experiencing a problem with the binding of the rugs. It seems to happen most frequently a month or two after the 30 day window expires to return. Or in some cases, arrives with this problem. Please someone come up with solution or remove the binding all together for these rugs. I have too many problems now with rugs that have this problem and these rugs are not inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: Strongbeautifulgentle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: I had been using memory foam mats and I found them hard to wash. I was looking for a mat that would be equally absorbent but was also soft and easy to wash. This mat seems to fit that. We needed a mat outside the shower, so I purchased the smallest mat. I have not tried to wash it yet, but just from its construction, I can see it will be easier to wash than the memory foam. Perfect for our needs! UPDATE: I've had that mat for about 6 months and have washed it many times, it washes well and still looks great! I liked it so much I bought another one! My favorite mat!
customer_reviews.author: whirlwind

customer_reviews.title: Use them as doormats!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves to walk around the house with his shoes on, that’s a battle I lost years ago!!! So I decided to replace all our doormats with these guys and it was the best decision ever! They take care of leaves, dust etc. Getting a bit dirty? Just shake them outside and they are as good as new! A little bit of a pain to wash (even in a washer/dryer) because they are extremely absorbent that they have a hard time letting go of the water (even with fast spin cycle). But that doesn’t change my 5 star review. These are worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Emilie

customer_reviews.title: Soft and beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: Soft and beautiful, but not a lot (if any) padding underneath. Can't speak for durability, as just received, however their lifetime guarantee speaks for their durability I believe. Price is exceptional for the product. Would add some cushioning, although that might make it less susceptible to washing.
customer_reviews.author: W

customer_reviews.title: It wouldn't stay in place as the Gorilla Grip claims.
customer_reviews.text: A big disappointment. It doesn't meet ANY of its claims. It wouldn't stay put as the Gorilla Grip claims. It doesn't have good skid-protection which is what I needed in a rug. Back to Amazon with this one. Buy something better!
customer_reviews.author: Chessie

customer_reviews.title: Love this bathmat!
customer_reviews.text: The feel and look of this bathmat are great. I love the grey color which has some brownish undertones. The absorbency is excellent too. I want to purchase more for my other bathrooms! I'd definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Looking
customer_reviews.text: I really like the look of these, and they are no so heavy to where when they get wet they will take forever to dry. First thing I did notice is they slip really bad on my tile floors. I am going to have to get some sort of non slip to put under. The color is spot on. - Update- Once these rugs warmed up and the rubber material on the backside was no longer cold from being outside, they stick to the floor perfectly and no longer slip.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: Love this rug!! It's beautiful, absorbant and the rubber backing is great until it falls apart :( I ordered this at the end of December 2019 And less than 4 months later after minimal washing per the instructions the rubber backing has basically shredded and now the rug won't stick to the floor and slips when walked on. I'm not sure if I will order another one, I don't expect it to hold up forever but do think it should be longer than just a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: I have finally given up and thrown these away
customer_reviews.text: These looked promising. That is until I had to wash them. They absorb so much water in the washing machine that you have to wash them individually and manually ring them a lot in order to get them to spin dry. I have a brand new, top of the line Electrolux washer and dryer. I have NEVER had ANYTHING be such a hassle to wash. I have to take them out and ring them dry by hand in order to get them to eventually spin dry. At first, I was going to try to give these to someone that I really hate...but then I couldn't even do that. SO in the trash they went. All 4 of them.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Bear

customer_reviews.title: Great shower rug!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great shower rug. I got the black. It’s very soft and plush and feels good on your feet. Doesn’t slide on my tile floor at all. As soon as I put it down, my dog layed on it (she liked it too) and promptly threw up on it. I was worried about how it would clean up, but it was really easy to clean w just a wet paper towel. So far so good. Washes well too.
customer_reviews.author: NJmom3

customer_reviews.title: Love this Mat!
customer_reviews.text: I’m still going to give this 5 stars because it’s an amazing mat. The only thing is that it would make it more in style and modern if the corners weren’t rounded. It would look more high end if it was a rectangle. All my modern ones from high end stores have straight edges. Rounded corners reminds me of my grand mother’s bath mats. Other than that it’s an amazing bath mat! It is the best one to date that I have ever bought. Incredible softness and holds water well. So glad I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Rose

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Rugs
customer_reviews.text: We just go received them and cannot comment on absorbency or. easy to clean. They are very soft and look beautiful in our master bath. We hand it to the company to let us find out which color worked best as we could not determine from the large color list on the Amazon site. It took us three attempts to get the color correct and the company and Amazon immediately refunded our returns. We previously bought three smaller ivory ones, by mistake but kept these for our other bathrooms. We are also very pleased with these. Great value for the price and hard to believe they have a ten year guarantee.
customer_reviews.author: GrandProf

customer_reviews.title: I was surprised by the thin feeling and lack of plushness.
customer_reviews.text: Based on all the 4-plus star reviews, I was surprised that I disliked these bathmats. They are thin, and do very little to cushion the floor under your bare feet. When dry, you can see the backing between each row of chenille nubs even without pulling them apart, that's how sparse they are! If you just want something utilitarian to step on when you get out of the shower, they're ok, but I wanted something that was a pleasure to sink my toes into, and something soft and cushioning when standing in front of the bathroom vanity. I would not recommend or buy again.
customer_reviews.author: FF

customer_reviews.title: Save your money!!
customer_reviews.text: These are soft but not good quality whatsoever and they slide all over the bathroom floor. Save your money!
customer_reviews.author: AmazinglyAmazonion

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The Gorilla bath mats are very soft and have good absorbency. Unfortunately after washing once the edge of the mat fell a part and frayed. I examined the seams around the entire mat and in my opinion, the stitching is too simple for the type of fabric. There needs to be a more durable stitching to keep the edging intact. Please correct this quality issue.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: The most luxurious bath rug!
customer_reviews.text: What a luxurious rug! It’s amazing to step on barefoot when you get out of the shower or bath. So easy to clean. Machine was delicate & hang dry or dry it on very low in your dryer. I hang dry over a banister. I own three of these now. They are the best bathroom rugs I’ve ever owned. Worth every penny. My dogs love them too! Great colors to match most any color scheme. Great rubbery no-slip backing. Buy these! They are so wonderful! I just bought three more in this color! I love these rugs! Best quality! I hope this is helpful.
customer_reviews.author: McSusie

customer_reviews.title: Great product and price!
customer_reviews.text: I like the absorbency of this very plush rug. I previously purchased a very expensive “plush” bathmat. It had a foam interior layer which quickly broke down and bunched up making the mat unsafe and unusable. This mat is plush by the outer design without an interior foam base. The mat has washed up very well too. I am adding this last comment. This bathmat is so plush and deep pile that my cat has started to make this rug his new bed! He is really enjoying this bathmat too. I will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Rug but Thin
customer_reviews.text: We really like this rug but the rug is thin. We're used to memory foam. It seems pricey but if it's durable, fine. On the plus side, it absorbs well and washes well. I dried it in the dryer on low and the backing held up. Only time will tell if it ends up crumbling or not like all of the rest. The color is good and the size is perfect for a small bathroom. It is very flexible so we always drap it over the tub to dry after using. Best of all is that it's non-slippery. Essential.
customer_reviews.author: Flava

customer_reviews.title: Call it "Gorilla Slip". Use at your own risk!
customer_reviews.text: Si the first 3 months with this rug were good. But after the rug absorbs more than 2 back to back showers it slips. The water soaks down to the bottom where it loses its grip! So These rugs are definitely a hazard! I slipped on this rug and hit the wall. Threw it out immediately after! BUYER BEWARE. Should be called "Gorilla SLIP" because you are gonna take a hefty fall whenever you slip on this dumb thing.
customer_reviews.author: Destany

customer_reviews.title: Great rugs, but not the grip I expected
customer_reviews.text: The rugs came almost the next day - but they do not grip the floor like I expected, since the name is "Gorilla Grip". I'm constantly re-adjusting them, because they move when you stand on them... BUT they don't just slide back into place, noooo, you have to bend down and move them by hand back into the place where they're supposed to be. I like the rugs otherwise, tho. Great color and I like the feel of them under my feet. Just wish they wouldn't walk around on their own.
customer_reviews.author: Robert K Price

customer_reviews.title: Stays dry, and feels soft.
customer_reviews.text: Great mat. I had spent more money on fancier mats (Pendleton) but they were not absorbent so wherever your feet were after coming out of the shower, would remain wet. The Gorilla mat is very soft under the feet and your feet stay dry and the mat dries out quickly. I had gotten two of the smaller mats initially not realizing they come in a bigger size. So I just got the big one for my other bathroom and so lovely. Mine are all the beige or tan color and it’s a classy color. In Vermont winter it’s nice to have these mats under your feet. And they don’t slip. Have not tried washing them yet.
customer_reviews.author: S. R. Rosenblatt

customer_reviews.title: slippery when wet
customer_reviews.text: when water gets under the mat at all its a death trap. my kids splash a bit in tub and when water gets under mat we've all almost bit it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Work very well
customer_reviews.text: I have these and I have the memory foam mats. I like these better. When I get out of the shower after my husband and step on the memory foam, it's pretty wet, but with these, the mats are drier. I'm not sure where the wetness goes, but I like how much drier these feel versus the memory foam. They wash easily in the washer. They aren't as easy to vacuum as the memory foam mats, so there's pluses and minuses.
customer_reviews.author: LP

customer_reviews.title: Very nice area rug
customer_reviews.text: I really like this rug. It's soft and attractive. I needed a rug slightly larger to cover my bathroom floor, but that's not anybody's fault but mine by not measuring the floor. I will keep it and use it for something else, because it is a nice rug.
customer_reviews.author: LadyG

customer_reviews.title: Feels nice but extremely slippery!!
customer_reviews.text: I never had a fear of slipping in the bathroom before I got this mat but boy do I have one now! It’s soft and absorbent and feels great on your toes. But I have never had a bath mat that slides like this?? It is so slippery and I have slid on it numerous times. Which is weird, because I’ve also never bought a bath mat that specifically mentions how good the grip is before either. It’s a fine bath mat but get some rug grips and be careful!!
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: Great rug for bath or shower
customer_reviews.text: We got this to replace another bathroom rug. Liked it so much we ordered another for second bath. Oddly, got a notice from Amazon that the original order had been refunded because it was not marked as delivered. Wrote to Amazon and said we got it and were happy. Gorilla came back and said don’t worry. Anyway, it is a great solution for us and even thinking about ordering a couple of smaller ones.
customer_reviews.author: Cherri W.

customer_reviews.title: Love this bath mat!
customer_reviews.text: This bath mat is super comfy on your feet, and I love how it doesn’t slip and slide! Besides my husband and myself loving the bath mat, our cats and dogs love it too - they lay on it in the sun and they look so comfy!! Good buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Jesus-Is!!

customer_reviews.title: Life saver for multiple dog household!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with these mats, I have two of them. Not only do they seem to suck water off of my dogs feet very effectively on rainy days, especially if you ask each dog to stand on one for a few seconds as they come in, but they do a great job removing grass clippings off of my messy husband’s crocks that he insists on wearing both in the yard and in the house! I’m ready to be the brand ambassador, volunteering both my beautiful dogs and my not so beautiful but dependable and stubborn husband for any and all ads, as long as I get more of these magical pieces of awesome in return.
customer_reviews.author: Sleeplessdomore

customer_reviews.title: GOOD QUALITY RUGS
customer_reviews.text: I PURCHASED THE 70"X24" TURQUOISE RUG FOR MY SHOWER. THERE IS A SMALL WALKWAY TO THE SHOWER AND THIS ELIMINATES THE NECESSITY OF USING TWO RUGS. I HAD LOOKED AT THESE PARTICULAR RUGS FOR A FEW WEEKS. I ORDERED TWO 24"X36" FOR MY HUSBAND'S BATHROOM TEN DAYS AGO. WHEN I LOGGED ON TO AMAZON TO ORDER THIS PARTICULAR SIZE, THE PRICE HAD INCREASED SUBSTANTIALLY. HESITATED FOR A FEW DAYS, AND THEN DECIDED TO ORDER. THE LENGTH AND COLOR ARE PERFECT. NOT QUITE AS SOFT AND THICK AS I HAD HOPED FOR, BUT WILL SEE HOW WELL THEY WEAR. THESE WERE THE NUMBER 1 BATHROOM RUGS RECOMMENDED ON SEVERAL 2020 REVIEW SITES.
customer_reviews.author: beowulf66

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for RV bathroom, the small sized mat is perfect for the space and it will prevent slipping on a wet floor or tracking moisture into the carpeted bedroom. It's made of excellent materials, feels soft, and seems to stay fluffed up well. I like the advertised wash-ability and that the rubber backing isn't suppose to flake or peel. At first, I was leaning towards a Diatomaceous Earth, stone like, bath mat because of it's absorbency. But opted for something I could hang over the shower wall when not in use and throw in the washer when needed. Very satisfied with my choice.
customer_reviews.author: Highland Horseman

customer_reviews.title: Definitely NOT non-slip
customer_reviews.text: This mats will slide out from under you if the floor gets a little wet. Horrible! I bought them because of the size offerings and the supposed non-slip backing. Waste of money! My disabled husband fell because the my slipped out from under him. Do NOT buy if you are looking for non-slip mats. I threw out all the packing so I guess I am out the money for these. Would give ZERO stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: phillygirl

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR WET AREAS
customer_reviews.text: NOT FOR WET AREAS! I ordered this for my bathroom because the description mentions for use in bathrooms. However when it arrived, the label states in really big warning message “For use in dry areas” (see picture I uploaded). Returned without using. Given the comments of several reviewers that they sustained falls from using it in a bathroom, I didn’t want to take a chance. I wish I’d seen those reviews when I was reading prior to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle K

customer_reviews.title: Not as plush as I thought it would be
customer_reviews.text: Seems like I had one of these rugs a few years back and loved it. This rug (20x30) is great as far as being non-slip and absorbent. That said, I wish the density of the chenille columns was greater. They are far enough apart from each other that I constantly see the backing whether or not the rug is in use. It's not very cushy underfoot. Haven't washed it yet, so have nothing to report on that score. Not sending it back, but hoping maybe the mfr. will update the design to make the rug design more comfortable underfoot.
customer_reviews.author: Mike The D.

customer_reviews.title: Slippery when wet
customer_reviews.text: The pros of this rug is that it is absorbent and true to color. The cons are that the size is smaller than I thought it would be and is actually extremely slippery if the floor does get wet. I’ve actually never had such a slippery bathroom rug before. I think this may be due to the material at the bottom that is kind of plasticy and supposed to help grip it to the floor. It does when the floor is completely dry but if water trickles underneath the sticking power is completely gone and turns into more of a slip and slide. My toddler found this out the hard way :/. I overall wouldn’t recommend this specific brand.
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sucks It Moisture and easily Machine washable Just wish it were Bigger
customer_reviews.author: A.W

customer_reviews.title: Buy this now!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best bathroom rug I’ve ever owned. It’s absorbent, but dries quickly and retains a soft feel. I have it in my basement bathroom on tile, running the length of the bathroom from the shower to the door. The pile height doesn’t get caught on the door, but it’s enough to give you a bit of cushion and cut out the cold in the morning. Washes up great!
customer_reviews.author: Jon Bueckers

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our travel trailer
customer_reviews.text: We use two different sized ones in our travel trailer. The 24x17” in the bathroom and the 30x20” by the door of the trailer. They both fit perfectly. The rugs absorb well and are very soft. We have messy kids and go to the beach a lot so the trailer still gets dirty even if we wipe our feet on the rugs...it doesn’t grab all of the sand/dirt. They don’t stick the best but they also don’t slide around. I’m happy with the rugs! They wash really easy in the wash machine, I just hung them outside to dry and they look brand new. Dried quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Chantel Kindblade

customer_reviews.title: A Good Choice
customer_reviews.text: My rating is more like a 4.5. These are very good bath mats, and I recommend purchasing them. I really like the backing that keeps the mat in place, and the color (ours is dark brown) is true to the pictures and is not fading with washing. I take a half star off because one Varner is pulling up s bit and I doubt that will resolve itself with more washing, and I wish the yarns used were a bit softer.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Green

customer_reviews.title: I Love It!
customer_reviews.text: I just got it, and so far, so good. I washed it in cold water and dried it on the lower of the two heat settings. It's thick and although the fibers are perhaps a bit stiller than I'd expected, more comfortable than my old, flat, threadbare mat. The bottom really, really, really adheres to the bathroom floor when I'm using the mat, or to the side of the tub when I've moved it out of the way--so much so that it's even a little hard to move: I have to lift it partially; I can't just drag it. :-0
customer_reviews.author: D. B. Levenstam

customer_reviews.title: Just wish it stayed in place
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as well as the matching around the toilet rug and the 60x24" for in front of tub. They are all soft, comfortable to step on bare footed, absorbent, and easy to clean. They don't shed or peel apart when washed. This rug and the around the toilet rug will not hold there place. The slightest twist of foot and the rug moves all over the place. Besides the fact that they don't actually grip the floor at all, it is a decent rug for in front of my bathrooom sink.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Stein

customer_reviews.title: Nice rug but won’t stay in place
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: I finally put the rug down. Out of the package the color looked good so it’s not way off as I stated before, however, It won’t stay in place at all. . I have to straighten it every time someone goes to bathroom. It slides and bunches up. I have a tile floor so I dont know if I could put suction cups on.haha Initial review. I haven’t put it down yet, but I was disappointed when I received it and saw that the color is way off, it is so much lighter than the photo, but I’m gonna keep it since it’s hard for me to go physically and return items.
customer_reviews.author: C C

customer_reviews.title: Must haves!!!
customer_reviews.text: These rugs are fabulous!!!! I have several of them all over by doorways and for dog food mats, several different sizes. They really help clean and dry feet before spreading nesses through the house after being outdoors. When a water bowl gets tipped over... no messy spill everywhere. Just change the mat and and hang it out to dry. I keep one by the main door too for human traffic in and out. What a difference from the average door mat! Best dog/door mats!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: Washer/Dryer safe - doesn't lose shape or backing at all
customer_reviews.text: I quite like this mat. It is the right size for my bathroom which was is what I was looking for originally but I was very happy to find a mat that is machine washable and can be thrown into the dryer. I waited to review until I actually washed and dried the mat and it came out perfectly. It isn't quite as soft as it looks and it does slip a little bit after a few day's use. This is not a problem for my household - It is the only reason I did not give it a perfect rating overall.
customer_reviews.author: Silci

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t absorb. Leaves puddles under mat.
customer_reviews.text: Worst bath mat EVER! It’s missing a bottom layer that absorbs water. It just puddles water under the mat and doesn’t dry. I’ve had it a week and needed to stick it in the dryer 3 times. My bathroom floor is soaking wet. I might move it to the laundry room. I only purchased because I loved the 24x60 inches. It was the perfect length of my entire tub. It just doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.author: Mom Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Too tall for door to clear, but nice otherwise
customer_reviews.text: It's a little too tall/shaggy for my bathroom door to clear, so I can't use it in the spot between toilet and door. My bathroom is a little small, but it does fit okay if I put it an inch away from the tub to cover the floor between tub and door. I'm going to order a separate little cheap washable rug for the floor between toilet and door. (Everyone sits, so nobody's peeing on anything. Just our bathroom floor feels like stone and not pleasant on the feet.)
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Don’t put the rug on damp or wet floor!! It will slide!
customer_reviews.text: I love the rug and it goes perfect in our new bathroom. However I’m not sure we will use it because both my husband and I almost killed ourselves falling, seriously sprained my wrist when getting out of the shower. When stepping on it when damp or even slightly wet underneath it gets very slick. It sticks great if it doesn’t get wet.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Martin

customer_reviews.title: Where have these been all my life?
customer_reviews.text: Love love love. Seriously where have these been all my life? I bought two, and the toilet rug set, after buying a gorilla grip door mat and loving that. These are super soft and seem well made. Just got them so don’t know how well they will hold up, but if it isn’t fantastic, I will update. They do make a big deal of not putting them on wet floors, I’m pretty sure that’s just a liability thing and would be true of any bath rug/mat, so it doesn’t bother me. Again, if—over time—that changes, I will update. TL, DR: super soft, would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Emily H.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Ordered three of these rugs on the glowing reviews and the product does not live up to reviews at all. Feels cheap and pile of the rug is not thick at all. Blurbs in product description use words like plushness and density. I would say these products are neither. Very disappointed. We bought a cheaper basic Target rug and it was much much nicer. Maybe they will last longer than other rugs but there is barely any cushion to it from day one. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: isthisit

customer_reviews.title: Durable, soft, high quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice rug, and perfect to throw in the washer and dryer. I only wish they had a wider one. This one is plenty long but I'd like it to be more like 48x36 to cover more of the bathroom floor. Great product though, I will be buying another one so I can always have one clean to put on the floor when I clean the bathrooms while I was the other and I will buy 2 more for a bath mat and in front of the toilet. Best mat on the market in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Nice and soft
customer_reviews.text: I like it, it does what is supposed to. The fabric feels very soft in my feet. Just be careful, the instructions clearly say not to put it under a wet surface. I once cleaned the bathroom included the tile floor and it was in my opinion almost dry, so I put the mat back and I took a shower, but when I put my foot down I slipped right away. Nothing serious happened, but just don't put it on any wet surface, it has to be completely dry.
customer_reviews.author: Maye M

customer_reviews.title: Very nice mats...wash well and hang to dry.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these mats, one for in front of the tub and a larger on for in front of the sinks. They are soft and absorbent. I washed them today and they did very well in the washer. I don't dry rubber backed mats in the dryer I hang them outside. So far so good I don't regret the purchase at all. Update: August 3rd I have washed these mats every 2 weeks since I bought them and they are great. I wash and hang them to dry and the backing is still fine the top is soft
customer_reviews.author: AnneB

customer_reviews.title: Don’t be lazy like I was...
customer_reviews.text: Get off your butt and go to Home Goods or some other store and try before you buy. This mat is terrible. I have no idea why it has so many good reviews but it’s not soft and it’s not comfortable to stand on and it’s not good looking! I regret wasting my money. It’s going to Goodwill. I bought some beautiful bath mats for far less money at Home Goods.
customer_reviews.author: Billie

customer_reviews.title: Very absorbent & soft
customer_reviews.text: Live this rug so far! So do the dogs. Apparently it’s comfortable to lie on. Have only had it a short time. Cannot assess durability or easy to clean. But it’s soft & absorptive.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Careful washing and drying
customer_reviews.text: I bought this rug because you are supposed to be able to wash them over and over and them not fall apart. I bought 3. They were super soft and super absorbent. Two were oval shaped, and then this squarish one. I followed the cleaning instructions to a T, and I’ve only washed them once. The two oval shaped ones... the top side of the rug is shrinking, causing the sides to flip up. This one the back side has started falling apart. I really liked them and now I’m pretty disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: chris cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Be careful with the colors, otherwise Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I suppose everyone has their versions of turquoise however this looks more like a baby light turquoise and it does not go with the shower curtain at all. I ordered this in navy blue and I'm trying to find someone who can use this mint green?
customer_reviews.author: Joesback6

customer_reviews.title: Good choice.
customer_reviews.text: Great rug for my bathroom. Soft & grips well. Washes well.
customer_reviews.author: toby111

customer_reviews.title: Durable and looks nice
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these two rugs for our bathroom. The runner is the perfect length as is the smaller rug for the areas in which I am using them. They are definitely non-slip, texture is somewhat firm (but I only walk on them, do not use as bath mat), colors as described and an asset to our bathroom. These are new so haven't washed them yet- -when I do I will provide an additional review IF they do not meet the standards described.
customer_reviews.author: Patsy Packer

customer_reviews.title: Slippery when wet...
customer_reviews.text: I gave it three stars because the overall product is very nice and it absorbs very well and stays dry on the top but if it, buy if any water gets underneath it gets very slippery. My husband was getting out of the shower and slipped and broke the whole curtain and hurt his arm because it did not stand its grip with a little bit of water that got underneath the rug😞 I was very excited to finally find a rug that didn’t get moldy and dried after each use until this happened
customer_reviews.author: Sheena

customer_reviews.title: Nice no slip bath mat
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good bath mat and it performs as advertised providing a safe non-slip surface. For me, if it was 2 inches longer and wider it would be perfect, but I am still using it and it is fine. Can't comment on how it will survive a wash and dry cycle, but I will be careful not to dry it on the hot setting.
customer_reviews.author: gprent

customer_reviews.title: No problem with the rug slipping
customer_reviews.text: I'm mystified by the number of reviewers who complained about this rug slipping. Mine sticks to the tile floor of my bathroom like it's glued there. As a test, I've put it on the wood floor of my living room and it doesn't slip there either. I haven't had to wash mine yet, so I can't comment about it's durability but it shows no wear at all after several months of use. I do wonder if the individual tufts, which are very thick and not attached to each other, might break off eventually but that hasn't happened yet so here's probably no reason to think it will.
customer_reviews.author: dizzy7

customer_reviews.title: Material is Not Soft to the Feet and Too Thin
customer_reviews.text: The material feel is not soft and feels too rough when I stepped on it, plus the chenille is too thin and I can see the bottom of the mat easily where there is no chenille. Very disappointed at the quality and touch as I thought Gorilla Grip is a good brand for quality stuff due to the price is slightly more expensive than other brands with similar products. I wish the chenille is more dense and thicker and softer.
customer_reviews.author: Lina

customer_reviews.title: Love the color!
customer_reviews.text: I only gave 4 stars because I just received the rug, so I don’t know how it holds up after washing or it’s grip on the floor. I purchased the burgundy and I absolutely love the color!!! It matches the burgundy stripes in my bath towels. I will update my review after washing. As of now, I would recommend this rug.
customer_reviews.author: Susan M

customer_reviews.title: Thin, Uncomfortable, and Move Around Easily
customer_reviews.text: Pretty disappointed in these. Bought based on other reviews, but they are clearly not worth $20 a pop. First off, they are quite thin. You can feel this when stepping on them, which makes them uncomfortable to step on. At minimum you would think a product named Gorilla Grip would stay in place. These do not. They move around rather easily on the tile in our bathroom. I would look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Ambrus

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous
customer_reviews.text: This throw rug is the most dangerous throw rug I've even been around. It does not cling to the floor and is very easy to roll up and trip over when you try to walk. My bathroom rug set is much more stable than this and I intend to throw it away when I get the new ones I ordered. I would have given it no stars. bit the site requires one.
customer_reviews.author: Dortha Wren

customer_reviews.title: Not the best, they will work but I’d order something else
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these. The color seemed to match what I expected but the quality is lacking. The texture is very course and not very “full”. The fibers are too sparse. It is the least comfortable bathroom rug I have to stand on. It seems to wick up moisture fine (I towel off in the shower so I don’t get much on there in the first place). All in all, I’ve gotten better rugs at Walmart for less money.
customer_reviews.author: JD419

customer_reviews.title: Does not absorb, stinks and requires a heavy duty washer we do not own.
customer_reviews.text: This is a bad choice. I wouldn't have bought it if I knew everything I know now. The rug does not absorb water: it collects under it and the rug begins to stink. You cannot wash it with a regular home washer, it burnt ours. It is much thinner than one of the cheaper competitors' rugs we also have. It is overall just a bad purchase. I really dislike it and will never buy again or recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Miss K

customer_reviews.title: There has been a lot of discussion about this mat. I used it without difficulty!
customer_reviews.text: I do not know what to say to customers who think this mat is not safe. I got it and used it the next night after a long shower which included washing my hair. It was not slippery, but I did place it on top of a vinyl mat if there was water which might drip through. I checked and there was no water. I like this very much and will continure to get more products made by the same company. I liked it!!
customer_reviews.author: RG

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended for value and quality!
customer_reviews.text: Great rugs! We have washed ours countless times because of an old kitty that sometimes gets confused about where her litter box is, but the rug stays in perfect shape! It sticks well to the floor if the floor is completely dry. If the floor is wet, it slides a bit. I have bought the same rug five times now so that we have some extras for when the cat has an accident because we like them that much!
customer_reviews.author: Ginger Stuart

customer_reviews.title: Stays in place, weird feeling on feet?
customer_reviews.text: It stays in place. I’m going to keep it, but I swear there is like a weird stabby / sharp feeling when I step on it? Really not what you want from a feet mat in a bathroom, but I’m not sure... maybe it will decrease with more washes. I wish the corners were squares off instead of rounded also - I think that looks nicer / more high class. It’s ok, I wouldn't buy again. There are probably better.
customer_reviews.author: Melody Justine

customer_reviews.title: great rug
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure if I would like this at first. There was no rubber backing so I was really careful using it in front of the tub (still am careful) but it washes up well, the color is great, and so far no slippage. Texture of the fabric is great, didn't have any odor, and it's soft. Kind of pricey but so far seems worth it. Ordered the toilet seat cover to match and that was good quality as well.
customer_reviews.author: Chamele

customer_reviews.title: Grip this ....
customer_reviews.text: Gripping is the last thing this rug does. I’d rather me bare foot. It’s place between the sink and the toilet. If you stand on it and lean into the sink it pushes back towards the toilet. It doesn’t grip any better than any other rugs. Over priced gimmick
customer_reviews.author: Douglas B. Maida

customer_reviews.title: Not machine washable
customer_reviews.text: The item says it’s machine washable but after the second time washing it this is what happened. Pieces of the backing are all over the place now. Disappointed... went straight into the trash.
customer_reviews.author: marisa sanchez

product_meta.title: Gorilla Grip Original Luxury Chenille Bathroom Rug Mat, 30x20, Extra Soft and Absorbent Shaggy Rugs, Machine Wash Dry, Perfect Plush Carpet Mats for Tub, Shower, and Bath Room, White
feature_bullets: FINALLY A MAT YOU CAN PUT IN THE DRYER: While most other products are not machine dryable or can only be washed a few times (read their small print), our GORILLA GRIP Chenille Bath Rugs have been tested and can be machine washed and machine dried time and time again. We use the more expensive TP Rubber backing (not PVC or glue) which is much stronger and durable for long lasting use.

ULTRA PLUSH SHAG: Pamper your feet! Our bath mat features a luxurious, soft pile that soothes tired feet and shields toes from the cold floor. The density and plushness of our pile surpasses that of most other brands.
/!\ WARNING: Place mat on CLEAN DRY SMOOTH FLOOR only. Water under mat can cause it to slip. Keep bottom of mat dry. Before using mat, test with foot to ensure it doesn't move.

ULTRA-ABSORBENT: High-pile, thick Chenille fabric helps save your floors from dripping water while you're stepping out of the bath, shower, or getting ready by the sink. Moisture is trapped in the mat's deep pile, allowing the rug to dry quickly and cleanly.

CREATE YOUR BATHROOM OASIS: With many different color and sizes to choose from, you will easily find rugs to coordinate with your decor! Plus, all of our rugs come with a 10-Year No Questions Asked Guarantee. If you are at all unsatisfied with your product, please contact us (through Amazon if past the standard return window) and we will be happy to provide you with your choice of a replacement or refund. We stand by our products 100% and want our customers to love them as much as we do!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars14,787 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
